stories.title: Germany leaves door open for extending nuclear power use amid energy crisis

stories.text:
Hey HN! I built Hacker News Mods as a place to collect any tools or sites related to HN.

I know the community has build some incredible things around HN, but they're difficult to track. We also started building one mod/tool for HN per week, and thought it’d be a good idea to showcase all of the tools we’ve created, as well as tools that others have created. The site is pretty scrappy, so any feedback is appreciated!

Also, please submit any projects that we don’t already have listed!

Thanks, Jarren
